subject: Re: Hello there everyone
author: marie32711
full_text:

>
> Hello Marie
>

posted. It turned out quite well. I think manual sweep works great. I

online now and then in my galleries. You can access those from my 
webpage

> http://misty.xm.com
> 
> and a few more things are posted on

> http://www.bestpsychicnetwork.info/profile/Misty

> Misty

> 
> --- On Tue, 11/18/08, marie32711 <m.mickley@...> wrote:
> 
> > Hi Misty,
> > Thanks for the reply, i too enjoy the manual method of
> > getting itc/evp
> > then again i cannot afford to get anything other than
> > that!! But i do 
> > think that if i am gettting such great results using this
> > method, 
> > then why change? I have such specific results...getting the
> > wonderful 
> > spirits that visit me to repeat words...and they have said
> > things to 
> > me that wewe to specific to just be radio
> > chatter...including both 
> > mine and my fiance's nicknames as children. (both VERY
> > strange 
> > names!!!)I have had accusations that i fake it, but to be
> > honest 
> > other than the fact i wouldnt know how to fake it, i have
> > no desire 
> > to do so, being slightly sceptical when i started doing
> > this, i have 
> > been blown away by the results i have acheived!!
> > As i mentioned before i have some videos on

> > it would be FANTASTIC if you could take a look and see what

> > Marie

Thanks misty willl take a look x
